channel.title: Need help with 614 command problem, A.S.A.P
channel.description:
Hi there, This is my first post on MOPAR, mainly because everything I've needed has been accessible here already. I'm in the process of coding a 614 server. I had all commands working as intended, but when I edited player rights for two other profiles, I received this error in game when typing in any other commands in game.
error reads:
"Use the reverse apostrophe key to open the console to enter that command. It is usually located under the ESC key."
I try typing the command in the developers console and nothing happens. I've done a search for files containing the text and nothing seems to appear.
Please offer any help/suggestions if possible!

item.title: Need help with 614 command problem, A.S.A.P
item.dc:creator: @Chiller Chiller
item.description:
@Chiller wrote:

In the developers console did you type like ::item in it? Because you are meant to just type for example item 995 100.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with 614 command problem, A.S.A.P

item.title: Need help with 614 command problem, A.S.A.P
item.dc:creator: @josh_614 josh 614
item.description:
@josh_614 wrote:

Hi there,
This is my first post on MOPAR, mainly because everything I’ve needed has been accessible here already.
I’m in the process of coding a 614 server.
I had all commands working as intended, but when I edited player rights for two other profiles, I received this error in game when typing in any other commands in game.

error reads:

“Use the reverse apostrophe key to open the console to enter that command. It is usually located under the ESC key.”

I try typing the command in the developers console and nothing happens.
I’ve done a search for files containing the text and nothing seems to appear.

Please offer any help/suggestions if possible!

Read full topic
